a.span: SLA Possible Quorum of the Board 12.17.2014
Final Minutes of Board Meeting 10.23.18 v2

div.p: Click here to enroll your New, Continuing or Returning Student

Based on the descision by Arizona Governor, Doug Ducey, Southwest Leadership Academy will be closed for the rest of the school year. To ensure our students continue to progress in their courses, we will be mailing their coursework home to the address listed in our system. Anyone who does not receive an envelope will be given their work when school resumes. Please contact your teacher directly if you have any questions. Each of their E-mails are below

Basados en la decision del Gobernador de Arizona Doug Ducey, Southwest Leadership Academy estara cerrada hpor el resto del año escolar. Para asegurar que nuestros estudiantes continuen progresando en sus cursos, enviaremos su rabajo a la direccion que figura en nuestro sistema. Cualquier persona que no reciba un sobre, se le entregara su trabajo cuando se reanuden las clases. Comuniquese con su maestro directamente si tiene alguna pregunta, cada uno de sus correos electronicos estan a continuacion.
Student Homework Packets are available on our website for download.

a.aria-label: Average Teacher Salary (opens in a new tab)

div.a: Click here to download your Homework Packets

h2.strong:
Important!!! You can watch videos of your classes, recorded by your teachers to help you with your homework packet at home. Click here to go to SLA youtube channel
See Menu Header above for Past and Present Board Meeting Minutes and Agenda
Click here to download SLA's Average Teacher Salary
Photographs of staff are listed under the Academic Tab as part of the staff directory. Staff resumes are available for review at the school, 4301 West Fillmore Street, Phoenix, AZ, between the hours of 8 AM and 3:30 PM.
Welcome to the 2019 – 2020 School Year at Southwest Leadership Academy!
Dear Parents and Students,
Southwest Leadership Academy’s goal is to ensure that every student gets the quality education necessary to be successful in life. That’s why we have made a commitment to create an engaging learning environment where you will be challenged and motivated to achieve your academic and life goals.
At SLA, we focus on education and life skills through a variety of learning opportunities. Southwest Leadership Academy is committed to providing you with core academics as well as the opportunity to participate in athletics, career and technical education, positive skill development and community related activities.
SLA staff and teachers want you to feel safe, supported, and surrounded by those that can help you through the difficulties and joys of being in High School. To achieve this success, we ask each student to be actively involved in their own academic success by respecting others, respecting school norms and rules, and studying hard to reach your potential. If you set high goals and work hard, you will begin to achieve them. We are here to help you succeed!
At SLA, we value each student and believe you are capable of great achievements. That is why we encourage you to take ownership of your education by showing up on time, meeting school expectations, completing your school work and participating in school programs. We look forward to a successful school year filled with great accomplishments from you and all the students at Southwest Leadership Academy.
La meta de Southwest Leadership Academy es asegurar que cada estudiante obtenga la educación de calidad necesaria para tener éxito en la vida. Es por eso que nos hemos comprometido a crear un ambiente de aprendizaje atractivo en el que se sentirá desafiado y motivado para alcanzar sus metas académicas y de vida.
En SLA, nos enfocamos en la educación y las habilidades para la vida a través de una variedad de oportunidades de aprendizaje. Southwest Leadership Academy se compromete a proporcionarle académicos esenciales, así como la oportunidad de participar en atletismo, educación profesional y técnica, desarrollo de habilidades positivas y actividades relacionadas con la comunidad.
El personal y los maestros de SLA desean que se sienta seguro, apoyado y rodeado de aquellos que pueden ayudarlo a superar las dificultades y las alegrías de estar en la escuela secundaria. Para lograr este éxito, le pedimos a cada estudiante que participe activamente en su propio éxito académico respetando a los demás, respetando las normas y reglas de la escuela, y estudiando arduamente para alcanzar su potencial. Si establece metas altas y trabaja duro, comenzará a lograrlas. ¡Estamos aquí para ayudarle a tener éxito!
En SLA, valoramos a cada estudiante y creemos que usted es capaz de grandes logros. Es por eso que le recomendamos que se haga cargo de su educación al llegar a tiempo, cumplir con las expectativas de la escuela, completar su trabajo escolar y participar en los programas escolares. Esperamos un año escolar exitoso lleno de grandes logros de usted y todos los estudiantes en Southwest Leadership Academy
GO RAMS!
Dr. Gregory Fowler - Principal

div.h2: To review the Arizona State Board for Charter School's Dashboard for Southwest Leadership, please click here.

div.p: Just under 100 SLA students attended this year’s prom at the Legacy Ballroom in Phoenix which for many was their final school fling with high school friends. Dressed up for the occasion, this year’s crowd was ready to party at the end of the school year but remained respectful and polite throughout the evening. Students had a lot of fun, had a delicious meal and soft drinks, danced away the night and had a chance to spend some quality time with friends before they graduated.

The SLA teaching staff and principal, Dr. Greg Fowler, mingled with the students and their dates and led some of the night’s dancing. The final event of the evening was the crowning of the 2019 Prom King and Queen and their court voted on by the students.

Prom 2019 will be an event that students will remember long into their adulthood and the school’s student counsel advisor, Alice Doan (HR) and guidance counselor Michelle Harris made the night as special as possible for the students. Dr. Fowler said, “These are great kids. They had a good time and the evening had no issues. It could not have been a better event!”

h3.span: 2019 Southwest Leadership Academy Academic and Career FaIr

div.div:
All public notices of meetings will be posted electronically on the Southwest Leadership Academy website and physically at the School Office located at 4301 W. Fillmore St., Phoenix, AZ 85043.
Southwest Leadership Academy does not illegally discriminate on the basis of sex, race, national origin, creed, age, color, religion, marital status, veteran status, sexual orientation, disability or any other consideration(s) protected by federal, state, and/or local laws in its educational programs, activities, programs or employment policies.
